trans-unit.source: Represents a class that provides data for the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragDrop(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs)" />, <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnDragEnter(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs)" /> events in the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma classe que fornece dados para os eventos <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragDrop(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs)" />, <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnDragEnter(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs)" /> e <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs)" /> no designer de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: These event arguments are passed to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes when a drag-and-drop operation is in progress on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Esses argumentos de evento são passados para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes quando uma operação de arrastar e soltar está em andamento na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes can access the information contained in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs> class to influence the behavior of the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes podem acessar as informações contidas no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs> classe para influenciar o comportamento da operação.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of activities upon which a drag-and-drop operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de atividades na qual uma atividade do tipo "arrastar e soltar" é realizada.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection that contains all <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> objects on which the drag-and-drop operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção somente leitura que contém todos os <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> objetos em que a operação de arrastar e soltar é executada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location where the activities are to be dropped on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o local em que as atividades devem ser soltas na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that defines the location on the workflow design surface where the activities will be dropped.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que define o local na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho em que as atividades serão removidas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> class creates a drag image for the activities being dragged.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> classe cria uma imagem de arrastar para as atividades que está sendo arrastado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> objects can use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs.DragImageSnapPoint%2A> property to snap the image to a target and drop the activities at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> objetos podem usar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs.DragImageSnapPoint%2A> propriedade para ajustar a imagem para um destino e remover as atividades no local especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> on the workflow design surface where a drag operation began.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho em que uma operação de arrastar começou.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that defines the location on the workflow design surface where the drag operation began.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que define o local na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho em que a operação de arrastar começou.
